author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47355 to include the hardware information in "a nice way" in the `edmProvDump` output. The "nice way" required to overhaul the way the process information is printed out, that should now be more self-documenting and consistent with the other sections.

The last commit updates the `hltInfo` script that is known to depend on `edmConfigDump` output (thanks for adding the test in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47860)

Context https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/30044

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1239

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass
title: Enhance process information in `edmProvDump` output and include hardware information there
